![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/hadexversum/HaDeX/master/inst/HaDeX/HaDeX.png)

## HaDeX: Analysis and Visualisation of Hydrogen/Deuterium Exchange Mass Spectrometry Data

Hydrogen/Deuterium eXchange Mass Spectrometry (HDX-MS) is a staple
technology in structural proteomics. HaDeX provides a analytic workflow
for HDX-MS data available both as [web
server](https://hadex2.mslab-ibb.pl/) or **R** package, accompanied by
dedicated application
[HaDeXGUI](https://github.com/hadexversum/HaDeXGUI). This is a second
version on previously published
[HaDeX](https://doi.org/10.1093/bioinformatics/btaa587).

### Local instance of HaDeX package

You can install the latest development version of the package:

``` r
devtools::install_github("hadexversum/HaDeX2")
```

After installation GUI can be accessed locally:

``` r
library(HaDeX2)
HaDeX_GUI()
```

To run the GUI, the dedicated package HaDeXGUI is needed. If is not
installed, the called function will check and inform if installation is
needed.

### Online manual

The HaDeX documentation is available
[online](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/).

### Funding

This work is supported by Foundation of Polish Science (TEAM TECH CORE
FACILITY/2016-2/2 *Mass Spectrometry of Biopharmaceuticals - improved
methodologies for qualitative, quantitative and structural
characterization of drugs, proteinaceous drug targets and diagnostic
molecules)*, Narodowe Centrum Nauki (Preludium Bis 1 2019/35/O/NZ2/03745
*Wysokorozdzielcza analiza danych z eksperymentów wymiany proton-deuter
monitorowanych spektrometrią mas*) as well as (Sonata 19
2023/51/D/NZ7/02847 *Ujarzmić agregację z AmyloGraphem 2.0: baza danych
i model predykcyjny modulatorów samoorganizacji amyloidowej*), and
Narodowa Agencja Wymiany Akademickiej (PPN/STA/2021/1/00025).

# Package index

## All functions

- [`HaDeX2-package`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/HaDeX2-package.md)
  [`HaDeX2`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/HaDeX2-package.md)
  : HaDeX2
- [`HaDeX_GUI()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/HaDeX_GUI.md)
  : HaDeX Graphical User Interface
- [`HaDeXify()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/HaDeXify.md)
  : HaDeX customized ggplot theme
- [`add_stat_dependency()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/add_stat_dependency.md)
  : Calculates confidence limits
- [`alpha_dat`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/alpha_dat.md)
  : Elongation factor eEF1B subunit alpha
- [`calculate_MHP()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/calculate_MHP.md)
  : Calculate MHP of the peptide
- [`calculate_aggregated_diff_uptake()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/calculate_aggregated_diff_uptake.md)
  : Calculates aggregated deuterium uptake difference for one time point
- [`calculate_aggregated_test_results()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/calculate_aggregated_test_results.md)
  : Aggregate test result
- [`calculate_aggregated_uptake()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/calculate_aggregated_uptake.md)
  : Calculates aggregated deuterium uptake for one time point
- [`calculate_auc()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/calculate_auc.md)
  : Calculate Area Under the Curve
- [`calculate_back_exchange()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/calculate_back_exchange.md)
  : Back exchange estimation
- [`calculate_confidence_limit_values()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/calculate_confidence_limit_values.md)
  : Calculate the value of confidence limit
- [`calculate_diff_uptake()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/calculate_diff_uptake.md)
  : Calculate differential uptake
- [`calculate_exp_masses()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/calculate_exp_masses.md)
  : Calculate measured mass, aggregated from the replicates of the
  experiment
- [`calculate_exp_masses_per_replicate()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/calculate_exp_masses_per_replicate.md)
  : Calculate measured mass for each replicate of the experiment
- [`calculate_kinetics()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/calculate_kinetics.md)
  : Calculate kinetics data
- [`calculate_p_value()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/calculate_p_value.md)
  : Create p-value dataset
- [`calculate_peptide_kinetics()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/calculate_peptide_kinetics.md)
  : Calculate kinetics dataset
- [`calculate_state_uptake()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/calculate_state_uptake.md)
  : Calculate deuterium uptake
- [`create_aggregated_diff_uptake_dataset()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/create_aggregated_diff_uptake_dataset.md)
  : Calculates aggregated uptake difference for peptide pool
- [`create_aggregated_uptake_dataset()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/create_aggregated_uptake_dataset.md)
  : Calculates the aggregated uptake for peptide pool
- [`create_control_dataset()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/create_control_dataset.md)
  : Create dataset with control
- [`create_diff_uptake_dataset()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/create_diff_uptake_dataset.md)
  : Generate differential dataset
- [`create_kinetic_dataset()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/create_kinetic_dataset.md)
  : Create kinetics dataset for a list of peptides and their states
- [`create_overlap_distribution_dataset()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/create_overlap_distribution_dataset.md)
  : Show overlap distribution data
- [`create_p_diff_uptake_dataset()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/create_p_diff_uptake_dataset.md)
  : Create differential uptake dataset with p-value
- [`create_p_diff_uptake_dataset_with_confidence()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/create_p_diff_uptake_dataset_with_confidence.md)
  : Create differential dataset with statistical validity
- [`create_quality_control_dataset()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/create_quality_control_dataset.md)
  : Experiment quality control
- [`create_replicate_dataset()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/create_replicate_dataset.md)
  : Create replicates data
- [`create_state_comparison_dataset()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/create_state_comparison_dataset.md)
  : Creates comparison uptake dataset
- [`create_state_uptake_dataset()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/create_state_uptake_dataset.md)
  : Create uptake dataset for chosen state
- [`create_uptake_dataset()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/create_uptake_dataset.md)
  : Create uptake dataset for multiple states
- [`get_n_replicates()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/get_n_replicates.md)
  : Get number of replicates
- [`get_peptide_sequence()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/get_peptide_sequence.md)
  : Get peptide sequence based on the position
- [`get_protein_coverage()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/get_protein_coverage.md)
  : Get protein coverage
- [`get_protein_redundancy()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/get_protein_redundancy.md)
  : Get protein redundancy
- [`get_replicate_list_sd()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/get_replicate_list_sd.md)
  : Get replicates sd
- [`get_residue_positions()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/get_residue_positions.md)
  : Get residue positions
- [`get_structure_color()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/get_structure_color.md)
  : Get color palette for 3D structure
- [`install_GUI()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/install_GUI.md)
  : Installs GUI package from GitHub
- [`is_GUI_installed()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/is_GUI_installed.md)
  : Checks if GUI package is installed
- [`plot_aggregated_differential_uptake()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/plot_aggregated_differential_uptake.md)
  : Plots aggregated uptake difference
- [`plot_aggregated_uptake()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/plot_aggregated_uptake.md)
  : Plots aggregated uptake
- [`plot_aggregated_uptake_structure()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/plot_aggregated_uptake_structure.md)
  : Plot aggregated uptake on the 3D structure
- [`plot_amino_distribution()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/plot_amino_distribution.md)
  : generate_amino_distribution
- [`plot_butterfly()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/plot_butterfly.md)
  : Butterfly deuterium uptake plot
- [`plot_chiclet()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/plot_chiclet.md)
  : Chiclet deuterium uptake plot
- [`plot_coverage()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/plot_coverage.md)
  : Peptide coverage
- [`plot_coverage_heatmap()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/plot_coverage_heatmap.md)
  : Coverage heatmap
- [`plot_differential()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/plot_differential.md)
  : Differential plot
- [`plot_differential_butterfly()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/plot_differential_butterfly.md)
  : Butterfly differential deuterium uptake plot
- [`plot_differential_chiclet()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/plot_differential_chiclet.md)
  : Chiclet differential deuterium uptake plot
- [`plot_differential_uptake_curve()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/plot_differential_uptake_curve.md)
  : Plot differential uptake curve
- [`plot_manhattan()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/plot_manhattan.md)
  : Manhattan plot
- [`plot_overlap()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/plot_overlap.md)
  : Plot overlap data
- [`plot_overlap_distribution()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/plot_overlap_distribution.md)
  : Plot overlap distribution
- [`plot_peptide_charge_measurement()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/plot_peptide_charge_measurement.md)
  : Plot peptide charge measurement
- [`plot_peptide_mass_measurement()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/plot_peptide_mass_measurement.md)
  : Plot peptide mass measurement
- [`plot_position_frequency()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/plot_position_frequency.md)
  : Position frequency
- [`plot_quality_control()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/plot_quality_control.md)
  : Plot quality control data
- [`plot_replicate_histogram()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/plot_replicate_histogram.md)
  : Plot replicates histogram
- [`plot_replicate_mass_uptake()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/plot_replicate_mass_uptake.md)
  : Replicate mass uptake curve
- [`plot_state_comparison()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/plot_state_comparison.md)
  : State deuterium uptake comparison
- [`plot_uncertainty()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/plot_uncertainty.md)
  : Uncertainty of the peptide measurements
- [`plot_uptake_curve()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/plot_uptake_curve.md)
  : Deuterium uptake curve
- [`plot_volcano()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/plot_volcano.md)
  : Volcano plot
- [`prepare_hdxviewer_export()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/prepare_hdxviewer_export.md)
  : Prepares data export for HDX-Viewer
- [`read_hdx()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/read_hdx.md)
  : Read HDX-MS data file
- [`reconstruct_sequence()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/reconstruct_sequence.md)
  : Reconstruct protein sequence
- [`show_aggregated_uptake_data()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/show_aggregated_uptake_data.md)
  : Show aggregated values in friendly form
- [`show_coverage_heatmap_data()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/show_coverage_heatmap_data.md)
  : Coverage heatmap data
- [`show_diff_uptake_data()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/show_diff_uptake_data.md)
  : Differential deuterium uptake data
- [`show_diff_uptake_data_confidence()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/show_diff_uptake_data_confidence.md)
  : Differential uptake data with confidence
- [`show_overlap_data()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/show_overlap_data.md)
  : Show data on peptide overlap
- [`show_p_diff_uptake_data()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/show_p_diff_uptake_data.md)
  : Differential deuterium uptake data
- [`show_peptide_charge_measurement()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/show_peptide_charge_measurement.md)
  : Show peptide charge measurement
- [`show_peptide_mass_measurement()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/show_peptide_mass_measurement.md)
  : Show peptide mass measurement
- [`show_quality_control_data()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/show_quality_control_data.md)
  : Show quality control data
- [`show_replicate_histogram_data()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/show_replicate_histogram_data.md)
  : Show replicate data
- [`show_summary_data()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/show_summary_data.md)
  : Summary data
- [`show_uc_data()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/show_uc_data.md)
  : Deuterium uptake curve data
- [`show_uptake_data()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/show_uptake_data.md)
  : Deuterium uptake data
- [`update_hdexaminer_file()`](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/reference/update_hdexaminer_file.md)
  : Update HDeXaminer datafile

### All vignettes

- [Importing
  data](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/articles/data_input.md):

  analysis](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/articles/example.md):
- [Glossary](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/articles/glossary.md):
- [Mass
  calculation](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/articles/mass_comparison.md):
- [Quality
  control](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/articles/quality_control.md):
- [Statistics](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/articles/statistics.md):
- [Data
  aggregation](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/articles/transformation.md):
- [Code usage](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/articles/usage.md):
- [Comparison between
  versions](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/articles/version_comparison.md):
- [Data
  visualization](https://hadexversum.github.io/HaDeX2/articles/visualization.md):
